TopicTitle: Spacecraft stability checker?plus DeltaV tool that tells you ship has enought for flying to planets?

Articles.Content: Can some one please make a Spacecraft/Space plane stability checker like what KerbalEDU has I know Ferram dos that but I would like one with out a aerodynamic overhaul.And can some one please make a mod that automatically calculate the Delta v for missions to other planet and back and a auto mission generate for people who likes to just build ships and watch them fly?
Kerbal Engineer Redux tells you dV,thrust,torque and a lot of interesting stuff
